title: Sooo... New LeaverBuster system...
body: Puts you in a queue for a few 5 minutes and it increases as you keep leaving/afking. (I think)

replies.body: By the way, I'm in a LeaverBuster queue and it keeps resetting when it hits 0. Is this intentional?
Hmmm, seems strict but it's a good idea for them trollers.
For your first few bustings, then it starts banning you.
